bgDescription: A medication for reviving downed individuals in emergencies. Its portable design includes a mechanical compartment with highly concentrated active ingredients for quick recovery.
description: Used to immediately revive and heal the selected downed Resonator for 100 HP. This item can only be used once every 60s. (Only effective for your own Resonators in Co-op Mode)
obtainDescription: Used to immediately revive and heal the selected downed Resonator for 100 HP. This item can only be used once every 60s. (Only effective for your own Resonators in Co-op Mode)
